title: Read Kate Hudson's Sweet Message For Kurt and Goldie's 34th Anniversary

persons.name: kate hudson instagram photo of kurt russell goldie hawn

text:
Kate Hudson Instagram Photo of Kurt Russell Goldie Hawn 2017 Read Kate Hudson's Sweet Message For Kurt and Goldie's 34th Anniversary March 24, 2017 1 Shares Chat with us on Facebook Messenger. Learn what's trending across POPSUGAR. 
Kurt Russell and Goldie Hawn 's incredible, three-decades-long romance is the stuff of Hollywood legend, and no one is more amazed by their relationship than daughter Kate Hudson . In honor of their recent 34th anniversary, the Deepwater Horizon actress shared a gloriously vintage throwback photo of her mom and Kurt, whom she affectionately calls "Pa," on Instagram . "My #tbt is these two love üê¶'s!" she captioned the black-and-white shot. "Mama Goldie and Pa killing it 80's style. I forgot to post a note on my parents 34th Anniversary so I figure why not now. A belated happy one my dear parents. Love you madly, deeply, profoundly ‚ù§#HairGoals #Love @officialgoldiehawn." As if we needed any more proof, this photo only further confirms that the happy couple and proud grandparents are aging like fine wine.
